unnormalised: I love athlete biographies! Reading about Sachin Tendulkar's early days at Shivaji Park is truly inspiring. Knowing his struggle, like in "Lagaan," makes his 100 centuries feel even bigger. These stories show how hard work in places like Ranchi or even small villages in UP can lead to achieving great things, even more than Rs. 10 crore endorsements!
